message: This is a fair offer.  I'll let you have the extra 10 since you're in control of the next move if you don't accept.
Alice, let's be reasonable. This deal gives you a decent share while recognizing the time pressure we both face.
I'm willing to compromise, but I still need a better deal than what you offered. This is closer to what I think is fair.
Alice, this is getting ridiculous. Take this offer before inflation eats away at your potential gains any further.
